Package bio.singa.structure.model.interfaces

Interface AtomContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AminoAcid, Chain, LeafSubstructure<FamilyType>, LeafSubstructureContainer, Ligand, Model, Nucleotide, Structure
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MmtfAminoAcid, MmtfChain, MmtfLeafSubstructure, MmtfLigand, MmtfModel, MmtfNucleotide, MmtfStructure, OakAminoAcid, OakChain, OakLeafSubstructure, OakLigand, OakModel, OakNucleotide, OakStructure, StructuralMotif
    public interface AtomContainer
    Everything that contains Atoms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Atom> getAllAtoms()
      Returns all Atoms.
      java.util.Optional<Atom> getAtom​(java.lang.Integer atomIdentifier)
      Returns an Optional of the Atom with the given identifier.
      void removeAtom​(java.lang.Integer atomIdentifier)
      Removes an atom from this container.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAtoms

        java.util.List<Atom> getAllAtoms()
        Returns all Atoms.
        Returns:
        All Atoms.

      • getAtom

        java.util.Optional<Atom> getAtom​(java.lang.Integer atomIdentifier)
        Returns an Optional of the Atom with the given identifier. If no Atom with the identifier could be found, an empty optional is returned.
        Parameters:
        atomIdentifier - The identifier of the atom.
        Returns:
        An Optional encapsulating the Atom.

      • removeAtom

        void removeAtom​(java.lang.Integer atomIdentifier)
        Removes an atom from this container.
        Parameters:
        atomIdentifier - The identifier of the atom to be removed.
